desc: Visit Movers & Cashmere for a refined offering of luxuriously soft, understated contemporary cashmere pieces, inspired by the modern, dynamic, vibrant, high-achieving Mover lifestyles of those who wear them. Shop women's cashmere clothing, accessories and lifestyle designs.  Complimentary Worldwide Shipping.

layout.text: A multidisciplinary art collaboration with Sørensen Leather + Norm Architects
